workflows.description: Use this to report a missed attack or a false positive judgement by Abnormal Security. We use this data to improve our models, and also give customers transparency into the frequency of Missed Attacks and False Positives.

data.name: Sample - Abnormal Security - 1.0.1
data.description: Abnormal Security helps to prevent email and email-like attacks, automate your security operations and reduce your total spend with one extensible platform.
